Package Controller

Class RequestRegisterDB

java.lang.Object
Controller.Database
Controller.RequestRegisterDB
public class RequestRegisterDB extends Database
Represents a Database of all Register Requests in FYP Management System.
Since:
2023-04-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lab A34 Assignment Team 1
